pages.text: A delicate activation crystal that shatters after a single use. Perfect for one-time rituals or when you need a disposable activator.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Binding:$() Must be bound before use$(br2)$(bold)Activation:$() Right-click a Master Ritual Stone with a valid ritual pattern$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$() $(#f00)Shatters after successful activation!$()$(br2)Unlike standard activation crystals, this fragile variant is consumed upon use. Use wisely.$(br2)$(italic)Power at a price.$()
